attributes.action: Make vaccination a condition of deployment in the House of Lords.
attributes.additional_details: Mandate vaccine as a condition of entry to the House of Lords.
attributes.background: All in the CQC-registered care sector with a resident over 65 now requires both vaccines before 11th of November and it is likely a 3rd will be offered as per the social care blog. As the average age of MP’s is 70 years old, it’s the least we can do to protect them!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the transmission of Covid-19, but your petition talks about the House of Lords and then MPs (who sit in the House of Commons), not peers (who sit in the House of Lords).

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

All MP's & staff to have Covid19 Vaccine to attend & work at Parliament by law: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593408
